efiscen_tools.gis.io

Class DatabaseReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • efiscen_tools.gis.io.DatabaseReader

  • public class DatabaseReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for reading variables and mappings from EFISCEN database. Uses EfiscenDatabaseComponents.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      DatabaseReader(java.lang.String addr, java.lang.String usr, java.lang.String pass, efi.efiscen.database.DriverType driverType)

      Gets EFISCEN calculated variable based on following criteria

      Returns values to disaggregate.

      • DatabaseReader

        public DatabaseReader(java.lang.String addr,
                      java.lang.String usr,
                      java.lang.String pass,
                      efi.efiscen.database.DriverType driverType)
               throws efi.efiscen.database.DatabaseComponentsException
        DatabaseReader constructor
        Parameters:
        addr - Database url
        usr - database user
        pass - password for the user
        driverType - type of database driver (MySQL, PostgreSQL, ODBC)
        Throws:
        efi.efiscen.database.DatabaseComponentsException - (see efi.efiscen.database)

    • Method Detail

      • getSpeciesMappings

        public boolean getSpeciesMappings(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>>> efiscenIDs,
                                  int mappingID,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> outSpeciesRasters,
                                  java.lang.String folder)
        Reads mappings and species raster filenames from database. Mappings are read from table GISMapping and species raster filenames from GISMapping.
        Parameters:
        efiscenIDs - HashMap to which mappings are stored.
        mappingID - Mapping id to query GISMapping table.
        outSpeciesRasters - Species raster filenames
        folder - Folder where species rasters are located.
        Returns:
        True if success, false in case of error

      • getEfiscenVariables

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Float>> getEfiscenVariables(int projectID,
                                                                                                             int scenarioID,
                                                                                                             java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> cisos,
                                                                                                             int step,
                                                                                                             java.lang.String table,
                                                                                                             java.lang.String valueColumn,
                                                                                                             java.lang.String dividerColumn)
        Returns values to disaggregate.
        Parameters:
        projectID - EFISCEN project identifier
        scenarioID - EFISCEN scenario identifier
        cisos - set of countries identifiers
        step - step of EFISCEN simulation
        table - EFISCEN results table to query
        valueColumn - table column to query for value to disaggregate
        dividerColumn - table column, where EFISCEN spatial entity is stored (normally Region as a part of country)
        Returns:
        Values are grouped by id formed from ISO * 1000 + divider id, then by species id

      • getEfiscenVariable

        public java.lang.Float getEfiscenVariable(int ciso,
                                          int sid,
                                          int step,
                                          java.lang.String table,
                                          java.lang.String valueColumn,
                                          java.lang.String dividerColumn,
                                          int divider,
                                          int species,
                                          int projectID)
        Gets EFISCEN calculated variable based on following criteria
        Parameters:
        ciso - country code (ISO)
        sid - EFISCEN simulation identifier
        step - step of simulation
        table - table with simulated results
        valueColumn - table column, where variable is stored
        dividerColumn - table column, where EFISCEN spatial entity is stored (normally Region as a part of country)
        divider - EFISCEN spatial entity (normally region) identifier
        species - tree species
        projectID - EFISCEN project identifier
        Returns:
        aggregated (by SUMM) result, null in case of SQL exception
